ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New Xegony Bard
ygData.msgSnippet: Unfortunately, your worst nightmare is true, last time I hunted in Skyfire mountains I was summoned by A Bottomless Gnawler (I think thats what it was) while
ygData.messageBody:
Unfortunately, your worst nightmare is true, last time I hunted in Skyfire
mountains I was summoned by A Bottomless Gnawler (I think thats what it was)
while running away using Nostrolo's Tambourine and Selo's. I think it was
rooted at the time and I hear that's what they do if they are rooted...

-Faras


-----Original Message-----
From: Christopher Sanders [mailto:christopher.sanders@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 10, 2001 2:19 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Xegony Bard



I've not experienced summoning. Is anything able to summon you, over a
certain level? If so, and I keep running away, will it just keep summoning
me? Assuming, of course, I can run again after the initial summoning...heh.

I don't like that summoning thing...heh. Dangit! I'm supposed to be able
to run away!!! :)

At
